messages.title: VOTE FOR CHANGE IN BRIGHTON PAVILION
messages.content: Our country is in desperate shape—social mobility is down, youth unemployment is up, our nation's finances have been trashed, our public sector is inefficient, and even now the recovery is far from certain. Britain is broke, and broken.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gordon Brown, George Galloway, Green MP
mentions.tacticalSituation: In this constituency, Brighton Pavilion, you have a choice of parties, each offering different policies.

issues.economy: Our country is in desperate shape—social mobility is down, youth unemployment is up, our nation's finances have been trashed, our public sector is inefficient, and even now the recovery is far from certain. Britain is broke, and broken.
